welcome_message_body: Welcome to 'Ain el Arbaa, Algeria! Nestled in the Atlas Mountains, this charming city is known for its warm hospitality, rich culture, and stunning landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that 'Ain el Arbaa has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Es Senia Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Es Senia Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tafaraoui Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tafaraoui Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sidi Belabbes Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sidi Belabbes Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
